main_definition: Complicated refers to something that is difficult to understand, deal with or explain due to its intricate nature or complexity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Challenging in a way that requires effort and time to solve
meanings_and_examples.example: The math problem was complicated and took me hours to figure out.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving many parts, aspects or elements that interrelate with each other
meanings_and_examples.example: A complicated legal case had numerous lawyers and experts involved in it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not simple; consisting of many interconnected components or issues
meanings_and_examples.example: The situation was complicated by the conflicting interests of multiple parties.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily confused due to having a lot of details and intricacies
meanings_and_examples.example: The instructions for assembling the furniture were so complicated that I couldn't figure them out right away.
